text: The 12th Orgburo of the Russian Communist Party (Bolsheviks) was elected by the 1st Plenary Session of the 12th Central Committee, in the immediate aftermath of the 12th Congress. ==Full members== {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders sortable" style="text-align:center;" border="1" ! scope="col" |Name (birth–death) ! scope="col" | Took office ! scope="col" | Left office ! scope="col" | Duration ! scope="col" | Note |- ! scope="row" | (1895–1971) | 26 April 1923 | 2 June 1924 | | — |- ! scope="row" | (1880–1936) | 26 April 1923 | 2 June 1924 | | — |- ! scope="row" | (1883–1936) | 25 September 1923 | 2 June 1924 | | align="left" | Elected at the 4th Plenary Session. |- ! scope="row" | (1879–1940) | 25 September 1923 | 2 June 1924 | | align="left" | Elected at the 4th Plenary Session. |} ==Candidate members== {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders sortable" style="text-align:center;" border="1" !
